[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=163884&d=1412973296[/IMG]I have 5 T206 cards all with Polar Bear backs. All backs are in good shape with the Brashear, Tannehill(overhead), and Abbott with small numbers in pencil at the bottom. The Eagan has small dots of paper loss. Please email me and I could send pic of the backs. I would like $17.00 each shipping included. Please pay with a paypal gift to [url]lisajoe97@yahoo.com[/url]

ALL SOLD.



Joe
